titles: The ascent to the mount of vision where many things were shewn, concerning I. The first resurrection; II. The state of separated souls; III. The patriarchal life; IV. The kingdom of Christ: with an account of the approaching blessed state of this nation.
author: Lead, Jane, 1623-1704.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
keywords: Jesus Christ --  Resurrection --  Early works to 1800.
